select.selectcomumnsMX_weibu: and reportState=1 group by jianchapart,ris_PatientId, csid,name,sex,age,ageunit,jianchadoc, baogaodoc ,huizhendoc,jianchapart,baogaoriqi,money,yinyangxing,shebeixinghao ,workroomname order by jianchapart
select.selectcomumnsMX: select ris_patientId as PatientId,csid as 超声号,name as 姓名 ,sex as 性别,age as 年龄,ageunit as 年龄单位, jianchadoc as 检查医生, baogaodoc as 报告医生,huizhendoc as 会诊医生,jianchapart as 检查项目,baogaoriqi as 检查日期, money as 费用,yinyangxing as 阴阳性,shebeixinghao as 设备 ,workroomname as 诊室 from patient

hisdb.HisHelp: 说明 1.要从HIS数据库导入检查项目和费用,必须先用sql语句构建两个字段,如下例所示 select 项目名称 as 项目,单价 as 费用 from 代码_收费项目表 where 项目类别='19' 构建出的字段 必须为 "项目" 和"费用"
hisdb.hisSelectSql: select 项目名称 as 项目,单价 as 费用 from 代码_收费项目表 where 项目类别='19'
